titleStmt.title: Two speeches made in the House of Peers the one November 20, 1675, the other in November 1678 / by a Protestant peer of the realm of England.
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

notesStmt.note: The first speech is upon the appointing of a day for hearing Doctor Shirley's cause; the second is on the state and condition of England, Scotland and Ireland.
Attributed to the Earl of Shaftesbury. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
